text.div:
Generated Narrative: StructureDefinition ext-R5-Coverage.costToBeneficiary

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Extension 0..*Extension(4.0.1)Patient payments for services/products
Slices for extension 0..*ExtensionExtension
Slice: Unordered, Open by value:url
extension:type 0..1ExtensionCost category
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Coverage.costToBeneficiary.type"
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptCost category
Binding: http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/ValueSet/ValueSet-R5-coverage-copay-type-for-R4 (extensible): The types of services to which patient copayments are specified.
extension:category 0..1ExtensionBenefit classification
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Coverage.costToBeneficiary.category"
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptBenefit classification
Binding: http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/ValueSet/ValueSet-R5-ex-benefitcategory-for-R4 (example)
extension:network 0..1ExtensionIn or out of network
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Coverage.costToBeneficiary.network"
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptIn or out of network
Binding: http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/ValueSet/ValueSet-R5-benefit-network-for-R4 (example)
extension:unit 0..1ExtensionIndividual or family
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Coverage.costToBeneficiary.unit"
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptIndividual or family
Binding: http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/ValueSet/ValueSet-R5-benefit-unit-for-R4 (example)
extension:term 0..1ExtensionAnnual or lifetime
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Coverage.costToBeneficiary.term"
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptAnnual or lifetime
Binding: http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/ValueSet/ValueSet-R5-benefit-term-for-R4 (example)
extension:value 0..1ExtensionThe amount or percentage due from the beneficiary
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Coverage.costToBeneficiary.value"
value[x] 0..1The amount or percentage due from the beneficiary
valueQuantityQuantity(SimpleQuantity)
valueMoneyMoney
extension:exception 0..*ExtensionExceptions for patient payments
Slices for extension 1..*ExtensionExtension
Slice: Unordered, Open by value:url
extension:type 1..1ExtensionException category
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Coverage.costToBeneficiary.exception.type"
value[x] 1..1CodeableConceptException category
Binding: http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/ValueSet/ValueSet-R5-coverage-financial-exception-for-R4 (example): The types of exceptions from the part or full value of financial obligations such as copays.
extension:period 0..1ExtensionThe effective period of the exception
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Coverage.costToBeneficiary.exception.period"
value[x] 0..1PeriodThe effective period of the exception
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Coverage.costToBeneficiary.exception"
value[x] 0..0Value of extension
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Coverage.costToBeneficiary"
value[x] 0..0Value of extension

Documentation for this format

name: ExtensionCoverage_CostToBeneficiary
title: Cross-version Extension `R5.Coverage.costToBeneficiary` for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents the FHIR R5 element `Coverage.costToBeneficiary` for use in FHIR R4.
purpose:
This extension is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the
element `Coverage.costToBeneficiary` as defined in FHIR R5
in FHIR R4.

The source element is defined as:
`Coverage.costToBeneficiary` 0..* `BackboneElement`

Across FHIR versions, the element set has been mapped as:
*  R5: `Coverage.costToBeneficiary` 0..* `BackboneElement`
*  R4B: `Coverage.costToBeneficiary` 0..* `BackboneElement`
*  R4: `Coverage.costToBeneficiary` 0..* `BackboneElement`

Following are the generation technical comments:
Element `Coverage.costToBeneficiary` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Coverage.costToBeneficiary`, but has no comparisons.

element.definition: A suite of codes indicating the cost category and associated amount which have been detailed in the policy and may have been  included on the health card.
element.comment: For example by knowing the patient visit co-pay, the provider can collect the amount prior to undertaking treatment.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url

element.definition: An Extension

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: The category of patient centric costs associated with treatment.
element.comment: For example visit, specialist visits, emergency, inpatient care, etc.
element.requirements:
Needed to identify the category associated with the amount for the patient. Element `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.type` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Coverage.costToBeneficiary` requires a cross-version extension.
Element `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.type` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.type`, but has no comparisons.

element.requirements:
Needed to convey the category of service or product for which eligibility is sought. Element `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.category` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Coverage.costToBeneficiary` requires a cross-version extension.
Element `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.category` has a context of Coverage.costToBeneficiary based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Coverage`.
